pkgmetadata.longdescription: KNetworkManager is the KDE front end for NetworkManager. It provides a sophisticated and intuitive user interface which enables users easily to switch their network environment. The range of functions encompasses the features implemented by NetworkManager daemon. It supports Wired Ethernet, Wireless Ethernet Devices (Unencrypted, WEP, WPA), Virtual Private Networks (OpenVPN, VPNC, PPTP) and Dial-Up (PPP).

use.flag: Build support for the OpenConnect VPN client
